properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 3:14AM CST until February 9 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow
accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory,
blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Beadle, Kingsbury and Brookings Counties.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM CST this
morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 AM this
morning to noon CST today.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST TODAY
